Description.Text:
Position Located 80 metres from the sea, the hotel Capitol is in a peaceful area, very close to the historical town centre.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment: 2000.
Credit cards accepted: Eurocard/Mastercard and Visa.
Breakfast: sweet and salty buffet . During meals choice between two menus, accompanied by mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
Garage with limited availability, at about 500 meters from the hotel, available by reservation, with supplement to pay on spot.
Unguarded parking with limited availability, situated at about 20 meters from the hotel, with supplement to pay on spot.
ALL INCLUSIVE treatment include unlimited drinks to the meals (water + wine) + beach service with 1 umbrella per room + 2 sun beds per room.Supplement available for weekly stays and not for single rooms. THIS SERVICE IS TO BOOK ONLY ON SPOT AND PAYABLE ON SPOT.
Check in: from 13h00. Check out: within 10h00.
